forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low 11C. WSW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low 51F. WSW winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.
